full_summary:
#GovernmentTender #RealEstate-propertymanagement

* **Tender Title (English)**: Real Estate Integrated Property Management Services 
* **Tender Title (French)**: Immobilier Services de gestion immobilière intégrée 
* **Reference Number**: MX-443121534313
* **Amendment Number**: 4
* **Contracting Entity**: Canada Post Corporation
* **Publication Date**: Wed, May 8, 2024 
* **Tender Closing Date**: Thu, Jul 17, 2024 2:00:00 PM
* **Expected Contract Start Date**:Fri, Jul 18, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: Fri, Jul 18, 2024
* **Trade Agreements**: 
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
	+ North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding 
* **Solicitation Number**: Doc1098089401
* **Notice URL (English)**: <https://www.merx.com/public/solicitations/2908823323/abstract?language=EN>
* **Notice URL (French)**: <https://www.merx.com/public/solicitations/2908823323/abstract?language=FR>
* **Tender Description (English)**: The Requirement outlines property management services to be performed by a qualified contractor subject to the terms and conditions specified in the ARIBA Sourcing Event. The solicitation and documents can be found on the Ariba portal at http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19637819  
* **Tender Description (French)**: Le travail à effectuer est décrit dans le système d'approvisionnement Ariba. Vous pouvez consulter les documents et les conditions de sollicitation sur le portail Ariba à http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19637819 
* **Contact Information**: 
	+ Contact Name: Tender Solicitation Control Officer  
	+ Contact Email: tender.control@canadapost.ca
